subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Braves dominated the National League in the 1990s with a stable of star pitchers, and now Atlanta again has a wealth of talent on the mound, in the majors and in the minors.
snippet: The Braves dominated the National League in the 1990s with a stable of star pitchers, and now Atlanta again has a wealth of talent on the mound, in the majors and in the minors.
